snippet: Banshee Music is working with the N.F.L. to commission new songs for the league to play during games, and is involving artists like Darius Rucker, Jordin Sparks and James Durbin.
abstract: Banshee Music is working with the N.F.L. to commission new songs for the league to play during games, and is involving artists like Darius Rucker, Jordin Sparks and James Durbin.
